abstract: Matthew Lee is the only blogger at the United Nations with media credentials, entitling him to free office space and access to briefings and press conferences.
snippet: Matthew Lee is the only blogger at the United Nations with media credentials, entitling him to free office space and access to briefings and press conferences.
lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS — The daily press briefing was routine. Marie Okabe, a spokeswoman for the secretary general, read a five-minute update on Somalia, Darfur and the Security Council’s actions, and about 30 journalists quietly listened.

headline.main: As Blogs Proliferate, a Gadfly With Accreditation at the U.N.
headline.print_headline: As Blogs Proliferate, a Gadfly With Accreditation at the U.N.
